title: Gymnast
subtitle: BricQ Motion Prime
description: What's cooler than a gymnast’s horizontal bar? A horizontal bar on a car! Let's make a gymnast-powered car.

title: Pass the Ball
subtitle: BricQ Motion Prime
description: How well can you work together to pass a ball across a sports field? Can your team score the winning goal?

title: Free Kick
subtitle: BricQ Motion Prime
description: The referee blows the whistle... Foul! The player gets a free kick. What does it take to be able to score every time?

title: Strike the Ball
subtitle: BricQ Motion Prime
description: One way to get better at sports is to understand the science behind them. It's time to apply your understanding of forces and interactions to build a tabletop ball-striking game.

title: Ski Slope
subtitle: BricQ Motion Prime
description: It's time to hit the slopes, and race! What does it take to go from the bunny slope to being a downhill pro?

title: Land Yacht
subtitle: BricQ Motion Prime
description: Can a land yacht sail into the wind? Investigate how invisible forces can change an object's motion and how this force acts from a distance.

title: Propeller Car
subtitle: BricQ Motion Prime
description: Although a sailboat or land yacht can’t easily sail upwind, it's possible to make it happen with clever engineering. Investigate how mechanical forces can change an object's motion and how these forces can act from a distance.

title: Protect Our Produce
subtitle: SPIKE™ Prime Set, BricQ Motion Prime
description: Apply Newton’s third law to design a solution that harvests produce from a tree, without causing damage from collision.

title: Smart House: Go Green
subtitle: SPIKE™ Prime Set, BricQ Motion Prime
description: Design, build, and program a smart home feature to minimize human impact on the environment.

title: The Guided Mission 2021-22
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Coach your team through a real FIRST LEGO League mission and prepare them for the challenges to come!

title: Grab and Release
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Build a motorized tool to move objects.

title: Colors and Lines
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Color Sensor to detect and follow lines.

title: Moves and Turns
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Driving Base to make precise and controlled movements.

title: Angles and Patterns
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Gyro Sensor to turn by precise angles, and use My Blocks to organize programs.

title: Sliding Down a Slope
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Build a Tilting Platform to experimentally determine the coefficient of friction of different objects.

title: Trial and Error
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Build a Bevel Bot and try to drive exactly 1 meter.

title: Free Falling
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Build a Drop Tower to experimentally determine the gravitational constant.

title: Drive Up a Slope
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can move up the steepest incline possible.

title: Shifting Gears
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Build a Geared Vehicle to investigate the impact of using different gear trains.

title: First Gear
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Build a Gear Model to master the basics of gears.

title: The Factory Robot
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design and build extensions onto the Driving Base and program it to complete two tasks.

title: Objects and Obstacles
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Ultrasonic Sensor to detect the Cuboid and react to it.

title: Assemble Your Crew
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can navigate to the lunar base, pick up the flight commander, and set her down at the base area.

title: Free the MSL Robot
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can navigate to the crater and free the MSL robot so that all six of its wheels are back on the Martian surface.

title: Activate Communications
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can navigate to the satellite dish and then push on it until it’s fully upright.

title: Launch the Satellite
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can place the Satellite inside the marked area on the Challenge Mat.

title: Get Ready to Go to Mars
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Get started with the Space Challenge.

title: Initiate Launch
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can navigate to the launch site and press the launch button to launch the Rocket and activate the Mars Outpost.

title: Secure the Power Supply
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can navigate to the Solar Panel and rotate the handle to unfold it.

title: Return the Rock Samples
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build, and program a robot that can navigate to the Rock Samples, collect them, and return them to the base area.

title: Roaming Vehicles
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design an autonomous car that is safe enough to drive on the streets.

title: Autonomous Intersection
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design an autonomous car that can safely cross an intersection.

title: Unlocking a Car
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design a way to use passcodes to protect cars from thieves.

title: Automatic Headlights
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design car features that will improve nighttime driving safety.

title: Autonomous Parking
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design cars that can park themselves safely without driver intervention.

title: Object Detection
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design ways to avoid accidents between vehicles and objects in the road.

title: Reversing Safely
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design features for a car that will improve safety as it reverses.

title: Cruise Control
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design a cruise control program to assist drivers by making their driving experience less stressful.

title: Line Detection
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design ways to improve driving safety by helping to prevent drivers from falling asleep and causing an accident.

title: Scissor Lift
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate how the function of a scissor lift is influenced by weight and height.

title: Wind Turbine
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of wind energy to electrical energy.

title: Solar Vehicle
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of solar energy to electrical energy

title: Solar Station
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of solar energy to electrical energy

title: Moving Sign
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to simple machines, mechanisms, solar energy, movability, performance, and fair testing.

title: Robot Arm
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate how to make the most energy efficient sequence for a Robot Arm.

title: Robot Hand
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate what pressure is needed to hold different objects without dropping or crushing them.

title: Stamping Press
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate how to make an energy efficient stamping press.

title: Scarecrow
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Design and make a pneumatic scarecrow model that moves.

title: Motorized Fan
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to energy, simple machines, motorized movement, performance, and fair testing.

title: Turn Using Sensor
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Your mission is to program your robot to complete a point turn to an exact angle by using the Gyro Sensor.

title: Dinosaur
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Design and make a dinosaur model that has pneumatic movement.

title: Acceleration of Gravity
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: The Free Fall learning module highlights the time-distance equation when an object is accelerating.

title: Hydro Turbine
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of the kinetic energy of moving water to electrical energy

title: Boat Pulley
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy using a block and tackle pulley system

title: Hand Generator
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore the conversion of mechanical energy into electrical energy using a hand-operated generator

title: Lawn Mower
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to simple machines, mechanisms, solar powered energy, performance, and fair testing.

title: Make a System That Sorts Colors
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic system that can identify at least three different colors of LEGO elements and sort them into separate locations.

title: Make a System That Communicates
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic system that follows a path and communicates its position at least twice along the way.

title: Court Lights
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to simple machines, light energy and systems, performance, and fair testing.

title: Make a System That Picks and Places
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic system that can pick up the Cuboid from one location and place it in another location.

title: Make a System That Manufactures
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic system that draws a pattern, performs the task accurately and is able to repeat the task.

title: Make a System That Moves a Ball
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic system that moves a ball 90 degrees from one location to another.

title: Make It Smarter and Healthier
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic creature that senses “food” and moves to get it.

title: Make It Smarter With Communication
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic creature that can interpret different signals and respond to each with different behavior.

title: Make It Move Up An Incline
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robot that can move itself up an incline as steep as possible.

title: Make It Move In A Pattern
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robot that can move itself in a pattern that forms a repeatable shape.

title: Make It Smarter and Faster
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic creature that can sense its environment and respond by moving.

title: Make It Smarter With a Sensor
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic creature that can sense its environment and responds with sound and light.

title: Curved Move
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Move Steering block to steer the Driving Base.

title: Move Objects
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Program the Driving Base to move and release the Cuboid.

title: Curved Move
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Move Steering block to steer the Driving Base.

title: Switch
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Switch block to make dynamic sensor-based decisions.

title: Straight Move
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Investigate different ways of controlling a Driving Base moving in a straight line.

title: Make It Move And Display Speed
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robot that can move itself and calculate and display its average speed.

title: Make It Move With Wheels
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program robots that can think and move on their own - once you tell them how!

title: Make It Smarter and Adaptable
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design, build and program a robotic creature that can sense light and dark conditions and respond with different behaviors.
